nodes.text: Rho-class airspeeders were a craft created by the Santhe/Sienar Technologies vehicle manufacturer around 0 ABY during the time of the Galactic Civil War, a conflict between the Galactic Empire and the Rebel Alliance. The airspeeders were favored by bush pilots on backwater worlds as their cockpits were similar to those in the Empire's TIE/LN starfighters.
The Rho-class was mentioned in Stay on Target, a Fantasy Flight Games' 2014 roleplaying game sourcebook for the Star Wars: Age of Rebellion series.
